;To add a e mail account tap Options, tap "Mail, Contacts, Calendars," faucet Add Account. then select the kind of account you would like to add and enter all your e mail data.
;Controlling Email messages Accounts
;
;You can include numerous e mail accounts and when the e-mail accounts are on the iPad it is simple to deal with the accounts.
;
;End employing an Account:
;
;Decide on "Mail, Contacts, Calendars" choose an account, then flip Account off.
;
;If an account is off, iPad doesn't display the account and does not deliver or check e mail from or sync other data with that account, until you turn it again on.
;
;Delete an account from iPad
;
;Decide on "Mail, Contacts, Calendars" select an account, then scroll down and tap Delete Account.
;
;Deleting an account signifies you can no longer entry the account on iPad. All electronic mail and the contacts, calendar, and bookmark info synced with the account are taken out from iPad.
;
;Delete Messages Instantly:
;
;Pick "Mail, Contacts, Calendars" choose an account, then pick state-of-the-art and then decide on Remove. The default is set on never ever. You can also select from a single day, one week or following one month.
;
;E-mail Alternatives
;
;There are several options for you to customize you e-mail app with, these possibilities are obtainable by going to configurations,"Mail, Contacts, Calendars".
;
;- Push email messages or Fetch at intervals
;- Choose the quantity of messages demonstrated on iPad (25, 50, seventy five, a hundred, 200)
;- Set how a lot of lines of each concept are previewed
;- Decide on a bare minimum font dimension
;- Set no matter whether iPad displays To and Cc labels (To or Cc next to every single concept in a record signifies no matter whether the communication was sent straight to you or you received a duplicate)
;- Set whether iPad confirms that you want to delete a message

;Email Troubleshooting
;
;E mail Attachments Won't Open
;
;The file type could not be supported. iPad supports the next types of email attachments:
;
;.document - Microsoft Word
;.docx - Microsoft Word (XML)
; .htm - Webpage
;.html - Webpage
;.crucial - Keynote
;.figures - Figures
;.pages - Pages
;.pdf - Preview, Adobe Acrobat
;.ppt - Microsoft PowerPoint
;.pptx - Microsoft PowerPoint (XML)
;.rtf - Rich Text Format
;.txt - Text
;.vcf - Contact Info
;.xls - Microsoft Excel
;.xlsx -Microsoft Excel (XML)
;
;Why cannot I deliver emails from my iPad?
;
;Soon after you have verified that all your e-mail account details is right, go to "Mail, Contacts, Calendars", tap on your electronic mail account, faucet on the Outgoing Mail Server, faucet on the Main Server, enter your user name and password where it says Optional.

;Flip iPad off, and then on again. Press and maintain the Sleep/Wake button for a few seconds till a red slider appears, then drag the slider.
